Major_Arcs.title: The Initial Rescue and Dinosaur Journey
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the characters Alley Oop and King Guz, starting with a dramatic rescue and transitioning into Alley Oop's journey with Bronto Soreness, highlighting initial conflicts and setting the stage for later events.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's Plight and Alley's Debt Collection
sub_scenes.description: This scene encompasses King Guz's apparent drowning and Alley Oop's subsequent rescue, immediately followed by Alley's demand for repayment of an old debt, revealing Alley's opportunistic nature.

sub_scenes.title: Travel Troubles with Bronto Soreness
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts Alley Oop's journey on Bronto Soreness, which is abruptly interrupted by Bronto Soreness's repeated collisions with trees, leading to a diagnosis of the dinosaur's old age and clumsiness.

narrative_arcs.title: Bronto Soreness Collides with a Tree

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Trade-In at Honest Zog's
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around the decision to trade in Bronto Soreness, leading Alley Oop to Honest Zog's dinosaur dealership, where he considers a newer, smaller model and ultimately makes a purchase, concluding with a poignant farewell to the old dinosaur.

sub_scenes.title: Considering a Dinosaur Trade and Dealership Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This scene starts with a suggestion to trade in Dinny's dinosaur and transitions to Alley Oop and another character arriving at Honest Zog's dinosaur dealership, browsing the available 'late model beauties'.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Test Drive, Deal Confirmation, and Sad Farewell
sub_scenes.description: This scene covers Alley Oop's interest in a smaller dinosaur, the test drive offer, deal negotiations, the exciting test drive that turns problematic, the deal confirmation despite an incident, and finally, a melancholic farewell to the old dinosaur.

narrative_arcs.title: Test Drive Offer at the Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Parting with the Old and Instructions for the New
sub_scenes.description: This scene details the emotional goodbye to the old dinosaur, instructions for handling the new dinosaur, and a reflective moment about the trade-in decision, ending with the old dinosaur being marked down for sale.

narrative_arcs.title: Old Dinosaur Marked Down for Sale

Major_Arcs.title: New Dinosaur Mishaps and Dinny's Scolding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Alley Oop's initial experiences with the new dinosaur, highlighting the challenges of handling it, including minor accidents and the critical reaction from Dinny, establishing a new dynamic and source of humor.

sub_scenes.title: Dealership Sales and Initial Ride with Mishap
sub_scenes.description: This scene contrasts dealership sales tactics with a disgruntled customer, then shifts to Alley Oop's first ride on the new dinosaur, which ends in a minor collision with a palm tree.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Salesman's Pitch and Dissatisfied Customer

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Angry Scolding
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts the immediate aftermath of Alley Oop's fall from the new dinosaur, focusing on Dinny's angry scolding and threats towards Alley Oop for his clumsiness.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Dinosaur Defense and Romantic Entanglements
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to Dinny's emotional outburst and defense of his dinosaur, then transitions into a series of romantic misunderstandings, competitions, and humorous takes on relationships, showcasing various facets of prehistoric romance and social dynamics.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Dinosaur Outburst and Protective Actions
sub_scenes.description: This scene captures Dinny's angry outburst about mistreatment, his defensive reaction to someone hitting his dinosaur, and his tender reassurance to his dinosaur, culminating in a charge towards cave children.

sub_scenes.title: Alley and Ooola's Breakup and Fishing Trip Misogyny
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts Alley Oop's invitation to Ooola for fishing, her rejection leading to accusations and a breakup, followed by a fishing trip scene filled with misogynistic musings and complaints.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Silence and Misogynistic Retort

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Competition and Flirtation
sub_scenes.description: This scene showcases a conversation about competition for female attention, specifically Oola's interest, leading to an argument and finally depicting successful flirtation with Oola, observed by jealous onlookers.

narrative_arcs.title: Surprise Meeting and Talk of Female Attention
Departure and Continued Doubt about Oola

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misunderstandings and Advice
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores romantic misunderstandings leading to physical altercations, followed by a humorous dialogue about romance and practical advice on how to be romantic, highlighting the different approaches to relationships.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Confrontation and Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts a jealous confrontation leading to a physical attack, followed by the revelation of a romantic misunderstanding, tender care for the 'wrong' person, and sarcastic commentary on feminine hearts.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Advice and Rhyming Attempt
sub_scenes.description: This scene features a conversation about romance, where the smaller caveman gives advice to the muscular caveman, defining romance, using a crude analogy, and suggesting observation of a 'French fried freak' for techniques, ending with the muscular caveman reflecting on rhyming in romance.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Gifts and Jealous Accusations
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores romantic gestures and competitive gifting, contrasting with scenes of intense romantic tension, jealousy, and accusations of infidelity, cannibalism, and misunderstandings in relationships.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Gifts Competition and Vulgarity
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts a romantic flower offering, a vow to outdo with petunias, a leafy branch gift met with crocodile confrontation, and finally, a judgmental observation of 'vulgar' tree climbing.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Accusations and Misunderstandings
sub_scenes.description: This scene includes a flashback anger over a stolen love interest, romantic tension and loss of control, an accusation of cowardice, a protection from cannibalism scenario, and finally, a jealous accusation about 'finger eating' resolved by clarifying it was 'kissing'.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Tension and Loss of Control

Major_Arcs.title: Infidelity, New Romance, and The Twitch Dance Craze
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc deals with themes of infidelity and its violent consequences, juxtaposed with attempts at new romance and the burgeoning craze of 'the twitch' dance, showcasing varied human reactions to relationships and trends.

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity and New Romantic Attempt
sub_scenes.description: This scene begins with an accusation and violent retaliation for infidelity, transitions to guilt and forgiveness, and then shifts to a caveman declaring a romantic new leaf and another attempting courteous courtship, ending with general frustration about 'dames'.

sub_scenes.title: The Twitch Dance Fad and its Toll
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces 'the twitch' dance craze, showing its physical toll with injuries, pressure to participate despite reluctance, and setting up a dance lesson.

Major_Arcs.title: Twitch Dance Lesson and Humiliating Outcome
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on a dance lesson for 'the twitch', highlighting comedic mishaps during the lesson and culminating in humiliation and a bizarre revelation about the dance's dangerous effects even on viewers.

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Dance Lesson and Instructor's Identity
sub_scenes.description: This scene covers the start of a 'twitch' dance lesson, foot-stepping mishaps during the lesson, and the humorous revelation of the dance instructor's name as Miss Glump.

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Lesson Debrief, Humiliation, and Hospitalization
sub_scenes.description: This scene shows a nightly debrief of the 'twitch' lesson, Alley's lack of progress leading to a prank and humiliation by other cavemen, and finally, a bizarre hospital scene revealing injuries caused by merely watching 'the twitch'.

narrative_arcs.title: Ants in the Pants Prank and Humiliation

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Research and a Romantic Interruption
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc connects modern researchers with prehistoric Alley Oop through time travel, initially for research purposes, but unexpectedly interrupting Alley Oop's romantic moment, leading to a brief visit to the 20th century and a quick return to the past.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel Plan for Research
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces modern researchers discussing the challenges of researching 16th-century Spain and devising a plan to use time travel to get firsthand information from a 'cave-man friend'.

narrative_arcs.title: Research Problem and Time Travel Solution

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel to Romantic Prehistoric Scene and Interruption
sub_scenes.description: This scene shows the time traveler anticipating reunion with 'Oop', transitioning to a prehistoric setting where Alley Oop is in a romantic moment with Oola, abruptly interrupted by accidental time travel to the present.

sub_scenes.title: Brief 20th Century Visit and Return to Ancient Spain
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts Alley and Oola's arrival in the 20th century, Wonmug's explanation of the Spain assignment and thesis importance, Alley's frustration about the interrupted kiss, and their quick return to ancient Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spain Assignment
Justification for Interruption and Thesis Importance
Reassurance and Return to Ancient Spain
Back in Ancient Spain and Alley's Comment

Major_Arcs.title: Bullfight Racket and Novelty Act
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a comedic bullfight scenario in ancient Spain, starting with a disruptive serenade, escalating into a physical altercation, and ultimately leading to a 'novelty' bullfight when the main matador is incapacitated.

sub_scenes.title: Serenade Racket and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts Buster causing a 'racket' with a loud serenade, leading to complaints, direct confrontation about manners, and initial confusion.

narrative_arcs.title: The Racket and the Dame on the Balcony

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight Delay and Novelty Act Solution
sub_scenes.description: This scene shows Buster's attack on the matador, the girlfriend's fury and revelation of the matador's identity, the matador's apology overshadowed by the manager's arrival, and finally, the bullfight being delayed due to Don Jose's unconsciousness and a desperate plan for a 'novelty act'.

narrative_arcs.title: The Girlfriend's Fury and Matador's Identity
Don Jose's Unconsciousness and the Delayed Bullfight
Desperate Measures and a Novelty Act
Audience Critique of the Novelty Matador

Major_Arcs.title: Impatient Wait and Romantic Reconnections
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc deals with impatient waiting for information and romantic entanglements, showcasing a mix of frustration, flirtation, and jealous accusations, ultimately leading to a clarifying moment of relief.

sub_scenes.title: Impatient Wait and Flirtatious Interlude
sub_scenes.description: This scene contrasts a woman's impatient wait for 'oop' with a separate flirtatious exchange and promised reward for bravery.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue, Jealous Accusation and Clarification
sub_scenes.description: This scene features a rescue, a reunion, a delayed kiss, a jealous accusation of infidelity, and finally, a clarification resolving the misunderstanding and bringing relief.

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and Temporary Rule Manipulation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the concept of 'King for a Day', depicting the initial portrayal of kingship, the burden of being carried, a planned temporary replacement, and the manipulative setup where the temporary king faces public humiliation while the former king enjoys the 'pleasures of being king'.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day Introduction and Burden of Kingship
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces the 'King for a Day' concept, showing the initial portrayal, a confrontation on the throne, and a dialogue highlighting the burden of kingship.

narrative_arcs.title: Dialogue on the Burden of Kingship

sub_scenes.title: Temporary King Appointment and Humiliation
sub_scenes.description: This scene covers the 'king' appointing a temporary replacement, the new king's proclamation met with mob rejection, the new king's isolation, and the previous king's satisfaction with his manipulative scheme.

narrative_arcs.title: New King's Proclamation and Former King's Command
Mob's Rejection and Former King's Justification
New King's Isolation and Cave Improvement

Major_Arcs.title: Guz's Ulcer Pills and Clam Dispute Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents two separate comedic scenarios: Guz's mistaken enjoyment of ulcer pills as bon-bons and the ensuing domestic dispute over dirty feet, followed by a clam dispute resolved by a wise man's unconventional method of confiscation.

sub_scenes.title: Guz and the Ulcer Pill Bon-Bons and Dirty Feet Punishment
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts Guz enjoying 'bon-bons' revealed as ulcer pills, the Queen's disgust, punishment for dirty feet, Guz's confusion and justification, the Queen clarifying her anger is about dirty feet, and Guz's sarcastic 'vacation' in the tub.

narrative_arcs.title: Bon-Bons Revealed as Ulcer Pills and Queen's Disgust
True Cause of Queen's Anger: Filthy Feet

sub_scenes.title: Rum-Pus Cheating and Clam Dispute Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts an accusation of cheating at rum-pus, a fight over money, clarification that the dispute is over found clams, the claimant asserting ownership, and the crowned man seeking resolution from his wise man, who ultimately resolves the dispute by confiscating the clams.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight Over Money and Royal Observation
Summoning the Wise Man for Resolution
Wise Man Consulted on the Argument

Major_Arcs.title: Recurring Fight and Royal Dinner Interruption
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features a recurring fight and a new accusation of money hoarding within the royal setting, transitioning to a dining scene where the crowned man anticipates a dinosaur dinner, only to be interrupted by a health warning and then a sudden violent attack.

sub_scenes.title: Recurring Fight and Royal Accusation
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts a recurring fight outside the palace and the crowned man confronting a servant about hoarding money, setting up new conflicts within the royal context.

sub_scenes.title: Royal Dinner Interruption and Violent Prank
sub_scenes.description: This scene includes the announcement of dinosaur dinner, the crowned man's excitement for the feast, a warning about his ulcer during dining, a playful 'peek-a-boo' prank that abruptly turns into a violent punch and accusation.

Major_Arcs.title: Apologies, Ruler Proposition, and Barberous Act Setup
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a diverse set of scenes ranging from apologies and expressions of regret to a proposition to become a ruler and a strange scene involving board measurements and ducks, culminating in the setup for a 'barberous act' involving forced shaving.

sub_scenes.title: Collection of Apologies and Ruler Proposition
sub_scenes.description: This scene compiles various short interactions: Oompa's apology for an unseen action, Pal's profound apology and food offering, a character's relief at returning to ordinary citizen status, Alley's ruler proposition, and a strange scene with board measurement and a 'strange duck' comment.

narrative_arcs.title: Pal's Profound Apology and Food Offering

sub_scenes.title: Fortune Telling and Forced Shaving Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This scene reveals the setup for a 'barberous act' beginning with a woman visiting a fortune teller, followed by a hairy man instructing Ooola to wait, then forcefully subduing another hairy man, and finally, revealing the 'barberous act' to be forced shaving in 'Moo Tonsorial Parlor'.

narrative_arcs.title: Moo Tonsorial Parlor and Forced Shaving

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Experiment and Unexpected Visitor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on a scientist's time machine experiment, starting with the setup and the scientist's intention to bring someone from the past, leading to the unexpected and surprising materialization of a Roman soldier instead of a typical 'cave-man friend'.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Setup and Unexpected Materialization
sub_scenes.description: This scene covers the scientist setting up his time machine with the intention of bringing someone from the past to the present, and the subsequent materialization of an unexpected Roman soldier, indicating a possible malfunction.
